reqs: DMED 500 001 is titled "Foundations of Digital Entertainment" and is offered by the Centre for Digital Media. The course is taught at the UBC Vancouver campus. Seats are restricted to 4th-year students in the Bachelor of Media Studies program at the UBC Vancouver campus. For more information, please email arts.mediastudies@ubc.ca.
description: Business, technological, social, and ethical issues of digital entertainment introduced and framed though historical exploration and critical analysis of economics, technical innovations, social demands, and ethical constraints involved.
